abort.no_devices_found: No devices found on the network
abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

data.no_extras: Turn off sensor extras to save database space. (requires restart)
data.extra_sensors: Create one sensor for each value from the status message from the device.  These values will remain unavailable whenever the device is not printing. (requires restart)
data.hide_ip: Hide the device IP address from the sensor extras. (requires restart)
